title: In one lifetime
creator_credit: John Martin-Jones and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: Political development in Papua New Guinea as seen through the eyes of Simon Kaumi, the Deputy Chief Electoral Officer. The progress he has seen in one lifetime includes the work of the Local Government Councils in replacing the traditional system and the 1968 House of Assembly election.
creator_credit_for_label: John Martin-Jones and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
